description: Welcome to the seventh fold of the multidimensional fabric of reality.

I go by ||Winstyl|| and my sole purpose is to assist you in taking advantage of this world and it's resources to achieve the highest written tier of accomplishment: --Completionist--. Spanning from intricate and convoluted factories to magic, alchemy and bewitchment to resolute exploration spanning thousands of kilometers to erecting your --own-- settlement where you can relax with a tea in hand.
Although, preperations must be in order. Any questions? I may or may not answer. It is up to you to find out.
